FuncDef: This command enables the context to configure a route-downloader instance. The route-downloader is a process that uses radius access-request messages to a particular server. The server returns either an access-accept or access-deny message. Access-accept messages also contain the prefixes (in the form of static blackhole routes in various formats). Only a single route-downloader object can be created.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of this RADIUS route downloader.
This keyword is mandatory while creating an instance of the route-download object.
